name: Jackettio+
author: arvida42 + Runtipi community
description: Selfhosted Stremio addon that resolves streams using Jackett and Debrid services with private tracker support.
short_desc: Stremio addon bridging Jackett indexers with debrid services.

form_fields.label: Addon ID
form_fields.hint: Unique identifier for the Stremio addon.

form_fields.label: Addon Name
form_fields.hint: Display name of the addon in Stremio.

form_fields.label: Addon Description
form_fields.default: Stremio addon that resolve streams using Jackett and Debrid. It seamlessly integrates with private trackers.
form_fields.hint: Description shown in the Stremio addon catalog.

form_fields.label: Addon Icon
form_fields.hint: URL of the addon icon.

form_fields.label: Server Port
form_fields.hint: Port on which the server listens.

form_fields.label: Trust Proxy
form_fields.hint: Express.js proxy trust settings for load balancers.

form_fields.label: Data Folder
form_fields.hint: Persistent data storage path inside container.

form_fields.label: Jackett URL
form_fields.hint: URL of your Jackett instance.

form_fields.label: Jackett API Key
form_fields.hint: API key from your Jackett dashboard.

form_fields.label: TMDB Access Token
form_fields.hint: The Movie Database access token for enhanced metadata (optional).

form_fields.label: Enable Localtunnel
form_fields.hint: Enable public access via localtunnel service.

form_fields.label: Cache Type
form_fields.hint: Cache storage type: 'sqlite' or 'redis'.

form_fields.label: Redis Host
form_fields.hint: Redis server hostname (only if using redis cache).

form_fields.label: Redis Port
form_fields.hint: Redis server port.

form_fields.label: Redis Database
form_fields.hint: Redis database index to use.

form_fields.label: Redis Password
form_fields.hint: Redis authentication password (if required).

form_fields.label: Rate Limit Window (seconds)
form_fields.hint: Rate limit time window in seconds (1 hour).

form_fields.label: Rate Limit Requests
form_fields.hint: Maximum requests allowed per rate limit window.

form_fields.label: Slow Indexer Duration (seconds)
form_fields.hint: Time in seconds to identify an indexer as slow.

form_fields.label: Slow Indexer Window (seconds)
form_fields.hint: Monitoring window for slow indexer detection (30 minutes).

form_fields.label: Slow Indexer Request Threshold
form_fields.hint: Consecutive slow requests before disabling indexer.

form_fields.label: Replace Passkey
form_fields.hint: Your passkey to be replaced with user's passkey for private trackers.

form_fields.label: Passkey Info URL
form_fields.hint: URL where users can find their passkey.

form_fields.label: Passkey Pattern
form_fields.hint: Regular expression pattern for passkey validation.

form_fields.label: Immutable User Config Keys
form_fields.hint: Comma-separated config keys that users cannot modify.

form_fields.label: Welcome Message
form_fields.hint: Custom welcome message in Markdown format for /configure page.

form_fields.label: Trust CloudFlare IP Header
form_fields.hint: Trust cf-connecting-ip header for rate limiting.

form_fields.label: Default Qualities
form_fields.hint: Comma-separated quality values (0=Unknown, 360, 480, 720, 1080, 2160).

form_fields.label: Default Exclude Keywords
form_fields.hint: Comma-separated keywords to exclude from search results.

form_fields.label: Default Max Torrents
form_fields.hint: Maximum number of torrents to display per search.

form_fields.label: Default Prioritize Languages
form_fields.hint: Comma-separated language priorities (e.g., english, french, german).

form_fields.label: Default Prioritize Pack Torrents
form_fields.hint: TV pack priority level (0=disabled, 1=low, 2=high).

form_fields.label: Default Force Cache Next Episode
form_fields.hint: Automatically cache next episode when watching series.

form_fields.label: Default Sort Cached
form_fields.hint: Sort order for cached torrents (key:reverse format).

form_fields.label: Default Sort Uncached
form_fields.hint: Sort order for uncached torrents.

form_fields.label: Default Hide Uncached
form_fields.hint: Hide torrents not available in debrid cache by default.

form_fields.label: Default Indexers
form_fields.hint: Comma-separated indexer IDs or 'all' to use all configured indexers.

form_fields.label: Default Indexer Timeout (seconds)
form_fields.hint: Timeout in seconds for indexer search requests.

form_fields.label: Default Meta Language
form_fields.hint: ISO 639-1 language code for metadata (e.g., en, fr, de).

form_fields.label: Default Enable MediaFlow
form_fields.hint: Enable MediaFlow proxy integration by default.

form_fields.label: Default MediaFlow Proxy URL
form_fields.hint: MediaFlow proxy service URL.

form_fields.label: Default MediaFlow API Password
form_fields.hint: MediaFlow API password for authentication.

form_fields.label: Default MediaFlow Public IP
form_fields.hint: Public IP address for MediaFlow configuration.

form_fields.label: Default Use StremThru
form_fields.hint: Enable StremThru integration by default.

form_fields.label: StremThru URL
form_fields.hint: StremThru service URL for debrid integration.

form_fields.label: Default Debrid Service
form_fields.hint: Default debrid service (realdebrid, alldebrid, debridlink).
